features: 【Effective Anti-Blue Light】This blue light screen protector features a layered anti-blue light design and multi-layer blue light filtering that effectively blocks harmful blue light, even during extended computer use. Better eye protection means reduced eye strain and fewer headaches.

【Perfect Compatibility】This laptop screen protector is specially designed to fit all brands of 15.6-inch laptops with a 16:9 aspect ratio (Not fit for a 16:10 resolution laptop). The diagonal measurement of the screen is 15.6 inches (measured viewable display area diagonally, corner to corner without the frame), and the filter size is 13.6 inches (34.5cm) x 7.6 inches (19.4cm). You'll enjoy a perfect fit for your laptop screen.

【Multifun Protection】In addition to its blue light protection, this anti glare computer screen cover offers dual protection for your computer. It also protects your screen from scratches, providing extra peace of mind when using your device. The anti-glare feature helps to eliminate annoying screen glare and delivers an unparalleled visual experience.

【Perfect for Touchscreens】Our computer screen blue light blocker works great on touchscreen laptops without any problems. It's designed to adhere to the screen only, and not the screen frame, leaving no adhesive residue. This blue light blocking screen protector is ultra-thin, once installed, it's almost imperceptible, providing a natural viewing experience without any added bulk. It also won't interfere with the touchscreen functionality, you'll enjoy a flawless touchscreen experience.

【Bubble-Free & Easy Installation】This laptop screen protector 15.6 inch is designed with a bubble adsorption design, which means that all small bubbles can be removed by lightly pressing during installation. It won't affect the beauty of your computer and provides an optimal visual experience. It's easy to apply and remove and leaves no residue, so you don't have to worry about making mistakes during installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great anti-reflection/ant-glare screen protector
reviews.reviewText: This screen protector serves its purpose very well with no trade-offs. It is great at preventing reflections & glare, even in tough light conditions (e.g. using a laptop in the car with harsh sunlight). Installation was straightforward and took only a few minutes. The touch screen performance remains great. And visually, it is easy to forget the protector is installed. At less than $20 shipped for two protectors, it's a good value. Bonus...when shopping for a laptop in the future, no need to seek out or pay extra for an OEM anti-glare/anti-reflection screen because this add-on does its job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking into it for a while: antiglare protector for laptops. I'd read many reviews to compare products but decided to buy this since its cost is acceptable. Thing is, I like the way it fits the screen (mine is a 15.6'' laptop) and how good it does at eliminating the gloss of the display. I've even started to use the touch screen back again since I didn't like the fingerprints in the glossy display 😁.Though it has many perks, the only thing that is a bit difficult is installing the protection all over the screen. Even following the indications I came up with one or two spots of dirt (not your fault Antogoo). Hardest part to install are the corners where the stickers are (the ones which came pre-attached) so be aware of this.Anyways I fully recommend the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Way better for outside work
reviews.reviewText: It's near impossible to sit anywhere with windows behind you, the sunshine or just a dang light and still be able to see a screen without just staring are yourself in all of the black spots on the screen. My last straw was working in a coffeeshop with coworkers and having to tilt my screen super far back just to see what I was doing. Found this and immediately ordered. It's pretty darn great. -1 star because it's the exact size of the portion of the screen that lights up with no overhang. It's a little annoying because you have to get it bang on the line (side and top) for it to exactly match the screen. First world problems, I can now take my computer outside or work near a light source without being annoyed into oblivion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect complement to my laptop
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, just stick to instructions and take your time for no air bubbles --do not do this if you are in a hurry. Perfect to protect screen and prevent glare. I am using the second one on my older laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars See screen without seeing what's behind you!
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this anti glare cover on a short time and am already impressed with how much it cuts the glare without taking away much from the picture. I can't wait to use it outside, which I don't do often, but it's so annoying with the reflection.It doesn't go edge to edge of the frame but covers where the display is located. The outside edge shows how much reflection is removed when using this screen protector.Thanks for a useful product. The screen should be non reflective from the factory.Used on a Acer Chromebook Spin 714 with 16:10 aspect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SO. MANY. AIR. BUBBLES.
reviews.reviewText: The directions on the back of the package are significantly different than the ones on the insert inside the package, and the "parts" supplied do not match up to either. Still, I cleaned the screen thoroughly with the provided materials - I'm guessing you're supposed to sort of "drag" the little tab-shaped adhesive bit across the screen in the final dust-removal process rather than repeatedly stick it down like you were removing tape residue. I hinged the protector with the two provided strips (took a while to figure out what they were talking about with that!) and then slowly applied the protector, pressing out air bubbles. And then (BE SURE TO LEAVE THE TOP SHEET PROTECTOR ON FOR THIS) attempted to squeegee out any remaining bubbles. And worked. And worked. And it's like they kept multiplying. I swear there are MORE bubbles now than there were when I first put the screen down.As a result, the screen is hugely distracting and when I finish this review, I'm yanking it off and throwing it away. Because in addition to being impossible to apply, I could detect NO difference in glare, especially when taking it outdoors in the shade. But just sitting on the counter, all it does is look dimmer. And bubbly. Did I mention the bubbles? Argh!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to apply
reviews.reviewText: I cleaned everything, followed the directions but still bubbles that I could not get out. Wasted the first one, settled for what I got when applying the second one. You cannot easily lift the screen to address particles/ bubbles so you better be good at applying the screen! Does reduce the glare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits and works well
reviews.reviewText: Truly anti-glare and it does not interfere at all with the touch screen. I think the clarity is good, but I'm not a gamer so my standard may be a bit different. My only negative was the instructions. It was not clear which side to put up/down. Fortunately my experience with past screen covers helped.
OLED is amazing, and price is right. Very happy with the purchase. Sound quality is not the best, but with earphones it's superb. Thank so much for this laptop!
Queda perfecto en la pantalla no necesita pegatinas, se adhiere bien, deben tener cuidado en poner el lado correcto que se pega, que es el lado 1.
Fue muy fácil de instalar, quedó perfecto en la pantalla y no perdió nada de brillo.
I am very satisfied with this product. It works just as advertised. I highly recommend this product.

Si me gusto, el detalle es que no vienen muy bien explicadas las instrucciones de instalación y el primero que puse lo tuve que quitar y poner de nuevo y no quedó muy bien que digamos, lo bueno que trae 2 piezas pero la segunda la iba a poner en otra pantalla. Cuando lo pongan el lado 1 es el que va pegado a la pantalla y el lado 2 es el de fuera de la pantalla. La verdad no hice la pruebe si filtra la luz azul pero si se siente más cómodo ver por la pantalla.
